abstract: Steve Ballmer received 5.5 percent less for the last fiscal year, as the world’s biggest software company suffered its first ever drop in annual sales.
snippet: Steve Ballmer received 5.5 percent less for the last fiscal year, as the world’s biggest software company suffered its first ever drop in annual sales.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft paid its chief executive Steve Ballmer 5.5 percent less for the last fiscal year, as the world’s biggest software company suffered its first ever drop in annual sales, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Microsoft C.E.O. Takes Pay Cut After Rough Year

abstract: Migrating files from a Windows Me computer to the Windows 7 environment is not easy — but not impossible either.
snippet: Migrating files from a Windows Me computer to the Windows 7 environment is not easy — but not impossible either.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a Windows Me machine and I am going to purchase a Windows 7 computer next month. A friend told me that I would not be able to transfer my documents and files from Windows Me to Windows 7. If this is true, is there any way to make this transfer?
